>
[Disturbing Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2186) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 59

**Archetype** [Oozemorph](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=84)

**Prerequisites**
[Oozemorph Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2185)

</column>

---

Your internal organs and blood vessels have shifted and changed, and even you don't know precisely where in your body they are. You gain resistance to precision damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. The DC of your flat checks to recover from [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) is 13, rather than 15.

<title level="2">Disturbing Defense leads to...</title>
[Peculiar Anatomy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2192), [Rubbery Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2190)
name: Disturbing Defense
